teamId.description: The id of the Team to which the invitation is given.

invitees.description: The principal IDs of the ones being invited to join the Team.

etag.description: Synapse employs an Optimistic Concurrency Control (OCC) scheme to handle concurrent updates. Since the E-Tag changes every time a MembershipInvitation is updated it is used to detect when a client's current representation of a MembershipInvitation is out-of-date.

createdOn.description: The date this MembershipInvitation was created.
createdOn.title: Created On

createdBy.description: The ID of the user that created this MembershipInvitation.
createdBy.title: Created By
